field.label: Enabled
field.help: If this Prefix-List should be enabled.

field.label: Description
field.help: Add an optional description for this Prefix-List.

field.label: Name
field.help: The name of your Prefix-List, please choose one near to the result you want to achieve.

field.label: IP Version
field.help: Set the IP version to use.

field.label: Action
field.help: Set permit for match or deny to negate the rule.

field.label: Network
field.help: The network pattern you want to match. You can also add "ge" or "le" additions after the network statement. It's not validated so please be careful!
